      • Investment

        public Investment(Investment investIn)
        Copy constructor for the Investment. Attempts to return a deep copy of the passed Investment. Sadly ArrayList only has clone, which is shallow copy. We haven't learned enough to make a fully robust copy.
        Parameters:
        investIn -
